_source.text: 18. Wake Me Up When September Ends - it was obvious how much passion was put into song, by everbody in the band, and about 3x better than the album verson.

text: 18. Wake Me Up When September **Ends** - it was obvious how much **passion** was put into **song**, by everbody
in the band, and about 3x **better** **than** the album verson.

_source.text: adele is better at song-writing than taylor, who has all the talent of a 13 year old writing a diary, but that's where her wisdom/experience over taylor ends.

text: adele **is** **better** at **song**-writing than taylor, who has all the talent of a 13 **year** old writing a
diary, but that's where her wisdom/experience over taylor **ends**.
